subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Starter Pedro Martínez left with a two-run lead, then watched the Phillies score four runs against the bullpen to roll to a 5-3 victory at Shea Stadium.
snippet: Starter Pedro Martínez left with a two-run lead, then watched the Phillies score four runs against the bullpen to roll to a 5-3 victory at Shea Stadium.
